SELECT SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE_ID ,
SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.FROM_DATE , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.TO_DATE ,
SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.BIKOU ,
SENIN.SEI || ' ' || SENIN.MEI as NAME,
SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.DELETE_FLAG , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.SEND_FLAG , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.VESSEL_ID , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.DATA_NO , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.USER_KEY , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.RENEW_DATE , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.TS
FROM SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE
INNER JOIN MS_SENIN SENIN ON SENIN.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.MS_SENIN_ID
WHERE SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.DELETE_FLAG = 0
AND ( ( SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.FROM_DATE >= :FROM_DATE AND SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.FROM_DATE <= :TO_DATE ) OR ( SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.TO_DATE >= :FROM_DATE AND SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE.TO_DATE <= :TO_DATE ) )

INSERT INTO SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE( SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE_ID ,
MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SENIN_ID , FROM_DATE , TO_DATE , BIKOU ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE_ID ,
:MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :MS_SENIN_ID , :FROM_DATE , :TO_DATE , :BIKOU ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE SET MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , FROM_DATE = :FROM_DATE , TO_DATE = :TO_DATE , BIKOU = :BIKOU ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE_ID = :SI_PERSONAL_SCHEDULE_ID AND TS = :TS
